55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Suhaib reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:Strange are the ways of a believer for there is good in every affair of his and this is not the case with anyone else except in the case of a believer for if he has an occasion to feel delight, he thanks (God), thus there is a good for him in it, and if he gets into trouble and shows resignation (and endures it patiently), there is a good for him in it

chapter.eng-name: The Believer's Affair Is All Good
